titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10000)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Previous action of discharging the Committee on the Judiciary vitiated by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the Menominee Tribe of Wisconsin a sum in full satisfaction of any claims regarding specified damages that the Tribe may have against the United States.
